atlas schema apply -f users.hcl -f schema.hcl -u URL --auto-approve
cmpshow users expected.sql

-- users.hcl --
table "users" {
  schema = schema.main
  column "id" {
    null = false
    type = int
  }
  column "status" {
    null = true
    type = text
    default = "hello"
  }
}
-- schema.hcl --
schema "main" {
}
-- expected.sql --
CREATE TABLE `users` (`id` int NOT NULL, `status` text NULL DEFAULT 'hello')
